'''Lammoth''' is the third track of the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-themed album [[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]] by [[Blind Guardian]]. The song is the scream of [[Morgoth]] after being attacked by [[Ungoliant]] for refusing to give her the [[Silmarils]]. The region later being known as the "Great Echo", or [[Lammoth]].<ref>{{S|9}}</ref>
